## Research
- **Topological data analysis (TDA)**, \textbf{applied algebraic topology},
\textbf{computational topology}, \textbf{computational geometry},
\textbf{road-map reconstruction} from GPS trajectory data.\\ \indent My research
primarily focuses on \textbf{shape reconstruction} and \textbf{big data
  analysis}. More specifically, I am interested in solving real-world problems
using tools from \textbf{algebraic topology} and \textbf{geometry}. In order to
analyze large, complex, and noisy data, I develop provable and efficient
techniques to find and classify significant geometric and topological
features.

[See more](research.qmd)
